Observed at: Powell River Airport 2:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

Visibility: 24 km

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h except 70 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening then increasing to 50 after midnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
